job_description:
LeverageTek is actively seeking a Senior Developer for a 4-month contract with its Ottawa-based customer.

Work Location
Remote

Key Tasks
Work as a developer/integrator within an agile software development team
Actively participate in all hybrid development activities
Backlog Refinement, Planning, Standups, Reviews, Retrospectives, Others
Design, Develop, Document, Integrate, Test required business functionality
Maintain up to date status of your assigned tasks within the DevOps tool
Support other members of the development team
Participate in all required SDLC processes
Assist with developing and updating project plans and roadmaps, workload backlog
Assist with developing and updating project related documents, reports, and presentations
Develop a deep understanding of the project and business and identify and communicate areas for improvement, efficiency, and collaboration
Document and communicate technical designs and development work
Effectively communicate relevant information to the project team
Transfer technical knowledge to other project developers and to sustaining/maintenance technical teams
Help foster a positive and effective team working environment
Working with the Sprint teams, participate in Agile Sprint development cycles with the development lens to progress system capabilities
Help to ensure solution meet business needs and requirements
Support development of requirements, stories/use cases, test cases, test scenarios, etc.
Participate throughout the testing phase of the project

Key Qualifications
7 years of experience of coding and software delivery in a distributed applications environment
5 years of experience with .NET Framework, including some or all of
ASP.NET MVC
ASP.NET Web API
Entity Framework
Demonstrated experience in building highly scalable and reliable Azure cloud services leveraging elements such as App Services, Azure SQL Database, Azure Service Bus, Azure Storage, Redis Cache, Cosmos DB, Azure Function, etc.

Qualifications
Degree or college certificate in Computer Science, Engineering or related discipline
4+ years’ experience as a .NET Developer
Strong knowledge and experience in development of online portals and distributed systems
5 years of experience with object-oriented design and development
Demonstrated years of experience with .NET 5/6 (or .NET Core 2/3), including some or all of
ASP.NET Core
Entity Framework Core
3 years of experience with microservices architectures and messaging frameworks (e.g. NServiceBus or Azure Service Bus )
3 years of experience with web development using MVC Framework Razor Pages or Blazor, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery
3 years of experience with Microsoft SQL Server
3 years of experience with REST web services and API development
3 years of experience with agile methods (e.g. Scrum, Kanban)
3 years of experience with source code management tools (e.g. git)
5 years of experience with unit testing (e.g. xUnit, nUnit)

Assets
10 years of experience of coding and software delivery in a distributed applications environment as a full stack developer
Demonstrated experience with cloud migration of legacy enterprise applications
Demonstrated experience with microservice architecture or service-based architecture
Demonstrated experience with container technologies (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes, etc.)
Demonstrated experience with CI/CD technologies (e.g. Azure DevOps)
.NET certification(s)
Azure Certification(s)
Oracle Certification(s)
Agile Certification(s)

About LeverageTek IT Solutions
Thank you for taking the time to apply! Since our company’s inception in March 2003, LeverageTek IT Solutions has worked resolutely to become one of the industry’s most recognized and trusted suppliers of technology staffing and business consulting services. With hundreds of successful engagements to our credit with many of Canada’s leading public and private sector organizations, we are the experts in identifying, deploying, and supporting IT and business talent on a contract, contract-to-hire, and permanent basis. We work with customers across all sectors including academia, aerospace, aviation, finance, government, health care, high tech, military, not-for-profit, and more.
Our responsive service and ability to deliver the right fit, on time and within budget, typically leads to repeat engagements and a long-standing relationship.
Accessibility accommodations are available upon request.
